MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY19 postcode area of Llanbrynmair . We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 12:22pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed that the fault has been caused by broken equipment on the overhead network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:46pm on 12th January 2021.
